title: how much money has r.c.soles and his band of boy friends cost tabor city,columbus county and the state of n.c. ?
text:
Bob,



A reporter has been assigned to work on your question. The answer
will take the form as a story in the StarNews and at
StarNewsOnline.com. Thanks for the idea. I'll try to let you know
when it's published, but that could be a while given the amount of
research required.
